thread.title: Jammu and Kashmir is high on PM Modi’s radar, claims RSS
thread.title_full: Jammu and Kashmir is high on PM Modi’s radar, claims RSS

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: Jammu and Kashmir is high on PM Modi’s radar, claims RSS
text:
Comment 
Kashmir is high on Prime Minister Narendra Modi government’s agenda, Rashtriya Swayamsewak Sangh ( RSS ) mouthpiece Panchjanya claims in the wake of Pakistan atrocities in Pakistan -occupied Kashmir. 
The Modi government is taking a holistic approach towards J&K and its reference to POK as POJK is a strategic one—acknowledging Pakistan ’s illegal occupation of parts of Jammu as well as Kashmir, stated Panchajanya. It is no wonder then that people of POK want to come to India as it is a peace loving country. 
“As shown in the video footage, the people had unleashed opposition to Pakistani Army and administration as they are not satisfied with Pakistan . This is not the first time that the people have protested against human rights violations by Pakistan in POJK area,” it said. 
Videos released by CNN-IBN showed protests against the Pakistani government in several areas of PoK, including Muzaffarabad, Gilgit and Kotli. It also exposes how the Pakistani establishment is using brutal force to quell rebellion in the region and resorting to massive human rights violation. */
